entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
